summary: Completed comprehensive testing of L4.2 Auto Warmup Starter and U2 As-of Date Picker features. Backend shows 11-step pipeline working correctly with AUTO_WARMUP step. Frontend As-of Date Picker is fully functional with simulation mode switching.
passed_tests: L4.2: POST /api/ops/daily-run/run-now now has 11 steps (was 10) including AUTO_WARMUP step 5
L4.2: AUTO_WARMUP step logic working correctly - BTC skipped (already APPLIED), SPX skipped (DEV mode)
L4.2: AUTO_WARMUP step provides detailed reason in response (e.g., 'Already in APPLIED', 'Not in PROD mode')

L4.2: Pipeline step order correct: SNAPSHOT_WRITE → OUTCOME_RESOLVE → LIVE_SAMPLE_UPDATE → DRIFT_CHECK → AUTO_WARMUP → LIFECYCLE_HOOKS → WARMUP_PROGRESS_WRITE → AUTO_PROMOTE → INTEL_TIMELINE_WRITE → ALERTS_DISPATCH → INTEGRITY_GUARD
U2: As-of Date Picker component renders correctly on FractalPage header
U2: As-of Date Picker dropdown opens and shows Live/Simulation mode toggle buttons
U2: Simulation mode shows date input field and preset buttons (1M ago, 3M ago, 6M ago, 1Y ago)
U2: Preset buttons correctly set date input values (e.g., 1M ago sets 2026-01-23)
U2: Run Simulation button triggers API call with asOf parameter
U2: UI correctly shows simulation mode with SIM badge and formatted date
U2: API /api/fractal/v2.1/focus-pack correctly accepts asOf parameter
U2: useFocusPack hook sends asOf parameter in API requests when in simulation mode
U2: Chart mode switching works (Price/Replay/Hybrid modes)
U2: Mode switching between Live and Simulation updates UI state correctly
Backend: All 34 daily-run tests pass (100% success rate)
Backend: Step timing captured for all 11 steps
Backend: Lifecycle before/after states captured correctly
Backend: Invalid asset validation working
Backend: Daily run history and status endpoints working
Frontend: All UI interactions working without errors
